name: Shetani
damage_resistances: cold; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Claws or Necrotic Bolts. Can replace 1 with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage + 18 (4d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Necrotic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 27 (5d8+5) necrotic.

actions.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Inhales drawing moisture from surrounding creatures. Each non-Construct/Undead creature within 15 ft. of shetani: 54 (12d8) necrotic (DC 18 Con half). If a creature fails the save by 5+ it suffers one level of exhaustion.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 18): At will: charm person silent image3/day ea: major image suggestion1/day ea: mirage arcane (as an action) programmed illusion

special_abilities.name: Devil’s Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magic darkness doesn’t impede its darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Necrotic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon weapon deals+4d8 necrotic (included below).
